meanings.definition: Covered in the most dirt or grime.
meanings.sent1: The old car in the junkyard was the gunkiest vehicle around.
meanings.sent2: After playing in the mud all day, his shoes were the gunkiest in the group.
meanings.sent3: The gunkiest toy in the box was the one the dog had buried in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: Her hands felt gunkiest after working in the garden without gloves.
meanings.sent5: The gunkiest part of the kitchen floor was under the refrigerator.

meanings.definition: Having the most unpleasant or sticky residue.
meanings.sent1: The gunkiest substance on the table was the spilled syrup.
meanings.sent2: The gunkiest glue was the one that took forever to dry.
meanings.sent3: The gunkiest mess in the kitchen was the result of a failed baking experiment.
meanings.sent4: Her hair felt gunkiest after using a new hair product that didn't wash out easily.
meanings.sent5: The gunkiest spot on the wall was where the leaky pipe had dripped for weeks.

meanings.definition: Showing the most signs of being dirty or messy.
meanings.sent1: The gunkiest room in the house was the teenager's bedroom.
meanings.sent2: The gunkiest clothes were the ones left at the bottom of the laundry basket.
meanings.sent3: The gunkiest corner of the yard was where the leaves had been piling up.
meanings.sent4: Her backpack was the gunkiest of all her school supplies.
meanings.sent5: The gunkiest part of the car was the floor covered in crumbs and wrappers.
